title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 105.1 - Statutory reference
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 105.1 - Statutory reference

State Regulations

The erection or maintenance of any advertising device, located within 660 feet of the nearest edge of the right-of-way of the Thruway
is prohibited pursuant to section
361-a
of the Public Authorities Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
105.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
